medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Photophobia began in early adulthood, progressive over time and severe enough to interfere with daily activities. Other symptoms include decreased vision which worsened after cataract surgery in some patients.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Uncomplicated bilateral cataract extraction in the past. No significant medical history revealed for the patients.
medical_history.family_history: One patient has a second-degree aunt with bilateral peripheral corneal vascularization. Two patients are from the same family with documented similar symptoms.
